scripts.build: esbuild src/background.ts src/content.ts src/popup/popup.ts --bundle --outdir=dist --format=iife --target=chrome90 && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp src/popup/popup.html dist/ && mkdir -p dist/popup && cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run build -- --watch
